title: Valentine's Day with Snowman Paul: A rhyming, humorous and entertaining introduction to Valentine's Day for kids
description: How will Dan describe the meaning of love to his best friend who happens to be a Snowman? With stunning watercolor illustrations and delightful rhymes, this holiday-themed picture book explores the meaning of Valentine's Day and show just how much fun it can be with beloved family and good friends.
author: Yossi Lapid
